iati-activity.title: TARGETED POVERTY PROGRAMMES IN VIETNAM
iati-activity.description: THE PURPOSE OF THE TARGETED POVERTY REDUCTION PROGRAMMES IS TO ALLEVIATE POVERTY AMONGST THE POOREST OF THE POOR IN VIETNAM, NAMELY AMONGST THE ETHNIC MINORITIES.

iati-activity.title: LOCAL COOPERATION FUND (LCF) IN VIETNAM
iati-activity.description: PREVENTION OF TRAFFICKING OF WOMEN AND PROMOTION OF SAFE MIGRATION. CONTINUATION OF ADDRESSING ACUTE ISSUE OF HUMAN-TRAFFINCKING AND LABOUR MIGRATION IN NAM DINH. FURTHER SENSITISATION OF ISSUES IN SCHOOLS AND COMMUNITIES. IDENTIFY MECHANISMS FOR COLLABOR

iati-activity.title: Frame agreement with NGO (Fida Int.)
iati-activity.description: People with Disabilities Empowerment Programme. The Empowerment Programme aims at improving the learning and working opportunities of people with disabilities in the Danang Province. In Vietnam majority of the people with disabilities live a life of social exclusion and poverty. Fida works together with the Danang Department of Education and Training in addressing the needs of this vulnerable and underprivileged people group. The programme responds to the situation through e.g. providing training and materials to teachers_ raising awareness among the local communities and upgrading the physical facilities of special schools. Support to vocational training and micro enterprise formation are also central to the programme. As the learning and working opportunities of people with disabilities increase_ they will have more choices in life. As a result_ the disabled will integrate better to the society and their standard of living will improve.

iati-activity.title: Frame agreement with NGO (Suomen Lahetysseura ry)
iati-activity.description: Health and Hygiene Promotion project of Church World Service Vietnam. To improve the quality of life for ethnic minority people and other disadvantaged groups by incrasing the access to and the quality of the health service and practice of hygiene behaviour.
iati-activity.sector: Basic drinking water supply and basic sanitation

iati-activity.title: ODA equity through Finnfund
iati-activity.description: Fund to invest in SMEs

iati-activity.description: Administrative costs at MFA, related to ODA. These costs cover all costs that can be counted (in full or percentually) as ODA at the Ministry for Foreign Affairs in Finland. Administrative costs at MFA from the Embassy of Finland in Hanoi

iati-activity.title: Rao II Bridge Project, Haiphong
iati-activity.description: Strengthening the infrastructure of the road traffic

iati-activity.title: Frame agreement with NGO (SASK)
iati-activity.description: The project aims to improve working conditions and the position of employees and to increase productivity in Vietnamese export companies by means of well-functioning labour relations and socially responsible business operations. The goal is to have the target companies comply with the minimum criteria of the Business Social Compliance Initiative (BSCI). A group of Finnish companies importing from Vietnam will participate in the project together with the largest trade union centre of Finland, SAK.

iati-activity.title: Frame agreement with NGO (SASK)
iati-activity.description: The aim of the project is to build a stronger trade union movement and functioning labour relations with the private sector in Vietnam.

iati-activity.title: Support to water sector in Vietnam_ Phase II
iati-activity.description: The planning of the second phse of WSPST has started. The planning mission has done the first draft project document. The appraisal mission will start in May 2008. The aim of the WSPST II is 1) to expand the construction of water and sanitation system to new target towns_ 2) to support the sustainable administration and maintenance of water supply and sewerage_ and 3) to institutionalise the revolving fund in the Vietnam Development Bank. The second phase will last 2009-2012 and the budget will be 12_7 mill. euros. Finnish contribution will be 10_5 mill. euros.
iati-activity.sector: Basic drinking water supply and basic sanitation

iati-activity.title: VIET/Medical equipment investment project for General Hospital of Cao
iati-activity.description: Medical equipment investment project for General Hospital of Cao Bang. Modern equipment and instruments provided by Finnish company GE Healthcare.

iati-activity.title: ONE UN pilot process in Vietnam
iati-activity.description: Support to Vietnam_s One UN pilot process.
iati-activity.participating-org: UNITED NATIONS AGENCIES, FUNDS AND COMMISSIONS

iati-activity.title: Innovation Partnership Programme
iati-activity.description: In its Socio-Economic Development Plan_ the Goverment of Vietnam has set knowledge-based economy and the building of companies_ innovation capacities as one of this main targets. Development Plan as well as Vietnam_s Science and Technology Development Strategy 2010 emphasise the importance of the development of financing and management structures_ stregthening of education and innovation training_ marketing of innovations as well as the integration of the Vietnamese stekolders into the international innovation systems and markets.

iati-activity.title: Frame agreement with NGO (Plan Finland)
iati-activity.description: Reduction of Violence against Children. To reduce the incidence of violence against the most vulnerable children in remote areas with a special focus on the prevention of physical and emotional punishment (PEP)

iati-activity.title: Frame agreement with NGO (Plan Finland)
iati-activity.description: Integration of the Human Rights-based Approach. To strengthen the capacity of local partners and Plan to apply the human rights-based approach so that all programmes will apply the key principles like non-discrimination_ participation_ best interest of the child etc in the local context

iati-activity.title: Frame agreement with NGO (Suomen Lahetysseura ry)
iati-activity.description: AFESIP/ Vietnam Against Human Traficking. Support to the victims of human trafficking

iati-activity.title: Local Cooperation Fund (LCF) in Vietnam
iati-activity.description: Quang Tri improves its adaptive capacity and recilience to climate chang. Local communities in Quang Tri province improves its adaptive capacity and resilience to climate change. 1.To enhance capacity of community based disaster risk management and climate change adaptation for local partners and local communities. 2.To facilitate farmerled action research in the local area including sandy land reformation, sand fill up use, droughts related to crop varieties and irrigation and salt intrusion. 3. To enhance the community resilience to climate change adaptation through livelihoods improvement. 4. To advocate the integration of climate change and disaster risks management into the social economic planning of commune and district level.

iati-activity.title: Local Cooperation Fund (LCF) in Vietnam
iati-activity.description: Capacity building on climate change for civil society organizations. Capacity building on climate change for civil society organizations. To raise awareness and build up capacity of civil society, focusing on NGOs and their partners, to effectively respond to and integrate climate change adaptation and mitigation into relevant existing and future programs to contribute to long term sustainable development of the country and Vietnamese people.

iati-activity.title: Local Cooperation Fund (LCF) in Vietnam
iati-activity.description: A Transparent and Sustainable Society in Youth's hand. A Transparent and Sustainable Society in Youth's hand. 1. The level of awareness, knowledge and skills of volunteer club members on building a transparent and sustainable society are increased 2. A network of the youth for a transparent and sustainable society is established 3. Topics of a transparent and sustainable society are shared, disseminated by volunteers to other youths and wider community, raising their attention.

iati-activity.title: Local Cooperation Fund (LCF) in Vietnam
iati-activity.description: Community based adaptation to climate change in Hue.. Community based adaptation to climate change in Hue. 1. Improved understanding about local vulnerability and adaptive capacity to climate changes through two case studies/assessments conducted in two selected communes in Huong Tra and Quang Dien districts of Thua Thien Hue province. 2. Increased knowledge about vulnerability and capacity in incorporating appropriate adaptive measures into livelihood, socio-economic and development strategies and programmes/planning process at household, commune, district and provincial levels 3. Competent officials at local, provincial and central levels are well informed of and are interested in incorporating best adaptation strategies and measures in socio-economic development strategies and plans at commune, district, provincial and central level.

iati-activity.title: Local Cooperation Fund (LCF) in Vietnam
iati-activity.description: TI program in Vietnam - Strengthening Anti-corruption Demand. Project name: TI program in Vietnam - Strengthening Anti-corruption Demand from Society, Public & Private Sector.

iati-activity.title: Fire-fighting equipment
iati-activity.description: The developments with fire incidents in Vietnam have worsened considerably. With the rapidly increasing economic activity and urbanisation it is estimated that the risk of fire is also rapidly increasing. The Government has assigned the Ministry of Public Security to unify State administration on fire control throughout the country. Special attention is paid to building up forces and equipping necessary vehicles and working out an investment policy for fire control. By 2010 166 new firefighter teams should be established. The aim of the project is to finance rescue vehicles and training.

iati-activity.title: Viet Tiep hospital equipment project in Vietnam
iati-activity.description: Viet Tiep hospital equipment project in Vietnam.

iati-activity.title: Hung Yen water supply project in Vietnam
iati-activity.description: The objective of the Hung Yen water supply project is the supply and installation of materials, equipment and training for Hung Yen water supply system in order to deliver clean water for private and public purposes. The system consists of water intake structures and pipeline, pumping stations, conventional chemical water treatment plant and distribution network.
iati-activity.sector: Water supply and sanitation - large systems

iati-activity.title: Rao II bridge in Vietnam
iati-activity.description: To construct Rao II bridge in the city of Haiphong in Northern Vietnam. The project aims at accelerating the urban and industrial development of the southern areas of Haiphong city to guarantee positive economic development and reducing the growing congestion in the central city area. The project will also facilitate the development of tourism services in the nearby Do Son town. More foreign investments are likely to be attracted.

iati-activity.title: Strengthening capacity of the cold water fish farming in Vietnam
iati-activity.description: ICI-project in North Vietnam; Capacity building for the development of cold water fish farming; activities inc. technical enhancement of public-private cold water aquaculture, training, consultations and national workshops; public-private contacts.

iati-activity.title: Strengthening of hydro-meteorological services in Vietnam
iati-activity.description: ICI project between Finnish Meteorological Institute and Vietnam's National Hydro-meteorological Service, NHMS. Problem: lack of ICT tecnology, modern forecasting tools and service production approach in NHMS strategy and implementation. Aim: To increase capacity of NHMS in the reduction of natural disaster risks and in the adaptation of Vietnamese society to climate change. To provide early warning services in the Red River delta, improve modern weather radar tools and technologies and enhance capacity of NHMS management staff. Activities: capacity building including on the job training, workshops and study tour to Finland.

iati-activity.title: Local Cooperation Fund (LCF) in Vietnam
iati-activity.description: Project goal is to initiate legislation and action to combat the causes and effects of climate change in Ha Giang Province. Local ethnic minority communities will pilot a participatory community-based flood and land-slide control and prevention model. Households, especially the poor in the resettlement from flash-floods and land-slide danger areas will develop more resilient livelihood activities to adapt to climate change. Ha Giang Provinceâs leaders and key agencies including Committee of Floods and Storm Control, Department of Planning and Investment and Department of Environment, Natural Resources will be supported in developing their Action Plan of climate change adaptation and mitigation.

iati-activity.title: Water Supply system in the Vinh City area
iati-activity.description: The objective of the project of Water Supply System in Vinh City area is to construct a new water supply system to provide fresh water for domestic and industrial demand in Vinh City neighbourhood.

location.name: Vinh City area in Central Vietnam

iati-activity.sector: Water supply and sanitation - large systems

iati-activity.title: South Binh Duong Rubbish Treatment Plant Project
iati-activity.description: Construction of solid waste treatment system in the area of South Binh Duong. Project will create a system to handle and recycle the municipal solid waste. The system will improve the treatment of the non-recyclable solid waste in order to minimize the environmental effects.

iati-activity.title: Local Cooperation Fund (LCF) in Vietnam
iati-activity.description: Administrative costs

iati-activity.title: Local Cooperation Fund (LCF) in Vietnam
iati-activity.description: Project name: TI Program in Vietnam - Strenghtening Anti-corruption Demand from Society, Public and Private Sector

iati-activity.title: Local Cooperation Fund (LCF) in Vietnam
iati-activity.description: The Vietnamese Womenâs Museum and the Tan Minh Single Womenâs Group will undertake the collaborative development of two public exhibitions and related education programs which will advocate and publicize: (1) Grassroots democracy (enhancing peopleâs participation) as an effective process for poverty alleviation using the Tan Minh Single Womenâs Group micro finance project as a case study example of the effective development and mobilization of a civil society organization through participatory decision making processes.(2)Public behavioral change in relation to womenâs rights and gender equality.

iati-activity.title: Local Cooperation Fund (LCF) in Vietnam
iati-activity.description: The project aims to enhance the capacity of members of Hanoi Women Association of Small and Medium Enterprises (HAWASME) for sustainable development including strengthening their business competitiveness, having new business opportunities and overcoming difficulties and also to enable HAWASME to have a sustainable development upon the end of the project.

iati-activity.title: Local Cooperation Fund (LCF) in Vietnam
iati-activity.description: This community-based climate change adaptation project will provide scientific basis and understanding of the local perception of and adaption capacity to climate changes through case studies/researches in selected sites in one of the most highly vulnerable areas to climate changes in Vietnam - Thua Thien Hue province. This project is unique in term of linking local issues and actions to policy development at local, provincial and national levels. Furthermore, the project would be developed as IREB/International Programme on Climate Change and Risk Variability-IPCRVâs demo-site research for climate change, where many Vietnamese and international institutions/scientists will be involved in future.

iati-activity.title: Local Cooperation Fund (LCF) in Vietnam
iati-activity.description: Green Generation Network got promoted and developed to connect young Vietnamese people who care about climate change and sustainable development in at least 30 volunteer and youth organizations and schools. At least 125 Young green change agents improved their knowledge and skills in facilitating and disseminating the topic of climate change in their groups, schools and network. At least 2000 Youths, students and volunteers in Hanoi, Danang, HCMC and other interested provinces increased their awareness and actions addressing climate change and other sustainable development issues.

iati-activity.title: Local Cooperation Fund (LCF) in Vietnam
iati-activity.description: Bridging Finnish research institutions with Vietnamese ones. Introduce Finnish know-hows and exchange of expertise. Enhance cooperation between Finnish and Vietnamese institutions.
